summary: A unit test suite that verifies the behavior of the object detection label source, covering configuration creation, legacy interface support, handling of missing or malformed URIs, conversion of polygon and multipolygon GeoJSON geometries into detection labels, and read operations with optional spatial extents.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of the object detection label source component within the Raster Vision framework, ensuring reliable ingestion and processing of detection labels for downstream training and inference pipelines.
